title: 119. How Money Is March Madness?
description: The NCAA basketball tournament grabs a lot of eyeballs, but turning them into dollars hasn't always been easy -- even when the "talent" is playing for free.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
